channel.title: Shilo Village Oldschool Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=7]S H I L O - V I L L A G E[/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=4][URL=http://"shilovillageos.tk"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29781315/Shilo%20Client.jar"]Play Now (Desktop Client)[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE]
[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]A B O U T - U S / C R E A T I O N[/SIZE][/FONT] Finally, a world where the 2006 era and custom content collide. There are countless, unique ways that content is added. Certain items will have effects that may be different from the 2006 style of old school RuneScape. I wanted to make a game like this server because when I played it, I enjoyed the game-style. The theory behind this type of server is to keep it close knit, when you can free roam around RuneScape it makes it harder for the community to connect because it's so spread out. This being said I don't plan for the server to be limited to Shilo in any manner. I want to have just as much content if not more but by using only Islands off of RuneScape mainland and dungeons either in or out of RuneScape mainland, but many of these will be reachable by entrances or traveling from around Shilo Village. If you go into my server hoping it will be just another server where you can get a whip in 30 minutes and be maxed within a few hours than I'm sorry to tell you but my server is meant to be somewhat tough, just as most 2006 remakes out there are.
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]P L A C E S - T O - T R A V E L[/SIZE][/FONT] [SPOILER=Places to Travel]- Shilo Village - Entrana - Brimhaven - Brimhaven Dungeon - Karamja Dungeon - Tzhaar Caves - Crandor - Waterbirth - Ape Atoll - Shilo Dungeon - Edgeville Dungeon - Taverly Dungeon - Miscellania[/CENTER][/SPOILER]
[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]M E D I A[/SIZE][/FONT] [SPOILER=Media] Fully working woodcutting! [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Woodcutting_zpsce3244b9.png[/img]
Fletching: Full arrow fletching (Feather + Arrow shaft = Headless arrow + Arrowtip = arrow) [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Arrowmaking_zps803afaea.png[/img]
Crafting: Tanning works! [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Tanninghides_zpsc4af7e71.png[/img]
Crafting: Flax and Wool spinning! [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Flaxspinning_zps3179ae06.png[/img]
Cooking! [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Cookinginterface_zps1b7b145d.png[/img]
Slayer System! [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Fullslayersystem_zps812e4882.png[/img]
Slayer Cave! [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/slayercave_zps31d08398.png[/img]
RuneCrafting [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Runecrafting_zpsfbf109d9.png[/img]
Shilo Dungeon [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/pit_zpsaf1bb5eb.png[/img]
Tzhaar Caves with Tzhaar Fight Caves [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/tzhaarcave_zpsfa1ed363.png[/img]
Ape Atoll Teleportation [IMG]http://i1317.photobucket.com/albums/t637/strverylow/Monkeychild_zps4e15dc19.png[/img]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=4]We could keep going on and on with countless great photos, but we'll leave you to see the rest of the adventure at Shilo-Village![/SIZE][/FONT] [/SPOILER]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]C R E D I T S[/SIZE][/FONT] - Jagex - RuneScape - Shilo-Village -Vesga for template - Mod Justin[/CENTER]

[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=7]S H I L O - V I L L A G E[/SIZE][/FONT]

[SIZE=4][URL=http://“shilovillageos.tk”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29781315/Shilo%20Client.jar”]Play Now (Desktop Client)[/URL][/CENTER][/SIZE]

[CENTER][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]A B O U T - U S / C R E A T I O N[/SIZE][/FONT]
Finally, a world where the 2006 era and custom content collide. There are countless, unique ways that content is added. Certain items will have effects that may be different from the 2006 style of old school RuneScape. I wanted to make a game like this server because when I played it, I enjoyed the game-style. The theory behind this type of server is to keep it close knit, when you can free roam around RuneScape it makes it harder for the community to connect because it’s so spread out. This being said I don’t plan for the server to be limited to Shilo in any manner. I want to have just as much content if not more but by using only Islands off of RuneScape mainland and dungeons either in or out of RuneScape mainland, but many of these will be reachable by entrances or traveling from around Shilo Village. If you go into my server hoping it will be just another server where you can get a whip in 30 minutes and be maxed within a few hours than I’m sorry to tell you but my server is meant to be somewhat tough, just as most 2006 remakes out there are.

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=6]P L A C E S - T O - T R A V E L[/SIZE][/FONT]
[SPOILER=Places to Travel]- Shilo Village

  • Entrana

  • Crandor
